articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: Hands-on with the 2025 iPad Air: Slightly better, slightly faster - Ars Technica
articles.description: Apple’s annual refresh is a minor one, but not much needed to change anyway.

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: US measles cases reach 5-year high; 15 states report cases, Texas outbreak grows - Ars Technica
articles.description: Since 2000, when measles was eliminated from US, only three years had higher cases.

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: Rocket Report: ULA confirms cause of booster anomaly; Crew-10 launch on tap - Ars Technica
articles.description: The head of Poland’s space agency was fired over a bungled response to SpaceX debris falling over Polish territory.
